section_title: ANNUAL COMPILATION AND ACCOUNTING REPORT FOR ANNEX B PARTIES UNDER THE PROTOCOL:
sentences: The Secretariat introduced the item (FCCC/KP/CMP/2009/15 and Add.1).
Bolivia expressed deep concern over excessive use of market mechanisms by Annex B parties.
William Agyemang-Bonsu (Ghana) and Makio Miyagawa (Japan) will co-chair a contact group.
